title: Black eye bean burritos
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1/2 small onion, finely chopped', '1 (400g) tin black eye beans, drained', '125ml vegetable stock', '1 fresh green or jalapeno chilli, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon fresh lime juice', '1/4 teaspoon salt and pepper to taste', '4 flour tortillas']
